headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Get the New Dewbauchee Seven-70 and Play 3 New Power Play Maps
content:
The GTA Online Sports class gets an upgrade in style and sophistication, with the new Dewbauchee Seven-70 now available from Legendary Motorsport.

There are also three brand new locations added to the team-based Power Play battle mode. Square off at Los Santos International Airport, the Port of Los Santos, or take on some turbocharged chaos on the banks of the Alamo Sea.
